law.history: Repealed 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 63, sec. 57, effective June 15, 1950. -- Amended 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 185, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 2739j-80, 2739j-81, 2739j-84.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Mileage of passenger vehicles, how ascertained and reported; penalty for failure to pay tax.
